name: Volcanic Cannon (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
Once per Duel, you can send 1 face-up "Tri-Blaze Accelerator" you control to the GY, then Special Summon 1 "Volcanic Doomfire" from your hand, Deck, or GY, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
Your opponent takes no effect damage the turn you activate this Skill.
